channel.title: Kick Command Revision
channel.description:
Is there a way, we can have 2 commmands.
::kick (user) <--(immediate kick of the user)
::kick2 (user) (message) <--(kick but has a 2 second delay and shows a message to the player that is being kicked?)
If so, could you please help me
